intro: Tsugunohi × Horror Game Scream Streamer OdaKen! The buzzworthy collaboration game
description:
ABOUT THIS GAME
The daily-life-invasion horror game Tsugunohi collides with streamer Odaken in the collaborative title Zombie Scream, now finally on Nintendo Switch™
Gameplay remains as simple as ever: move the protagonist to the left, advance relentlessly, and replay their everyday routine with no complex controls—just press forward and repeat
Originally when first shown in 2020 only Odaken was playable; this Nintendo Switch™ edition adds a brand-new branching ending so you can now experience two distinct conclusions
Take control of Odaken himself and feel the terror haunting this damp, oppressive town
Tsugunohi’s eerie atmosphere and Odaken’s unique personality mesh perfectly, offering thrills both to fans of the series and to Odaken supporters

STORY
Odaken, a Japanese game streamer living alone in a suburban apartment, posts videos of his gameplay day after day. Unnoticed at first, his ordinary life shifts inexorably into a nightmare—and beyond it lurks the ultimate horror

PROFILE
Tsugunohi series: a horror-invading-daily-life game in which the protagonist walks sideways along various paths, witnessing the creep of terror into ordinary scenes. A flagship indie horror creation by ImCyan
Odaken: known for his lighthearted banter, he streams horror titles and goofy games alike, and also shares piano performances—showcasing his versatile talents
